hadiths.text: Abu Hurairah narrated that :Allah's Messenger said: "Salat is this Masjid of mine is better than a thousand Salat in another, except for Masjid Al-Haram

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي أَىِّ الْمَسَاجِدِ أَفْضَلُ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Which Of The Masajid Are More Virtuous
